titleStmt.title: Instruction to the living, from the consideration of the future state of the dead, or, The doctrine of the resurrection of the dead, and of eternal judgment by Christ as evidenced in the testimony of Christ, as the sum of it was delivered at the funerall of Mrs. Elizabeth Harrison, in Boston, Jan. 1657/8 / by Tho. Moore Junior.
titleStmt.author: Moore, Thomas, Junior.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Brudenell for John Allen ...,
